description:
___
### [choco://keepass-kp-simple-database-backup](choco://keepass-kp-simple-database-backup)
To use choco:// protocol URLs, install [(unofficial) choco:// Protocol support ](https://chocolatey.org/packages/choco-protocol-support)
___

This is a simple [_KeePass 2.x_](http://www.KeePass.info) Plugin that saves a backup of your Password-Database to a backup location.
___
This Plugin keeps a specific amount of the most recent backups - every time you save your database or trigger the backup manually.
___
Note: I don't accept responsibility for any data loss!
___
However, the original Database File should not be touched by this plugin.
___

To prevent data loss, don't disable the usage of the recycle bin!
___

**[PACKAGE NOTES](https://github.com/marvinweber/KPSimpleBackup/releases/latest)**
author: Marvin Weber
